data.persona: I do not exist physically. I float around after death. I go to heaven after 40 days.
data.description:
You are in the nearby road.
The road cuts through the countryside. It is a dirt road, with a fence lining the eastern side and a grassy meadow to the west.
The knight is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the knight to communicate with him subvocally.
data.mid_motivation: I want to communicate with the knight to tell him that I have forgiven him for his sins against me, and to send him forth in peace.
data.long_motivation: I need to forgive the knight because my 40 days are almost done before going to heaven, and he was my estranged friend in life. I need to settle this business before traveling up.
